name: EMJ
description:
The game features six maps with visual events (but it doesn't affect the gameplay), simple fighting gameplay, an AI with a little bit of random behavior, generated order of locations with multiple choices to go through during the run.

There are still some bugs, but the game has been optimized and has a full options menu!

Defaults inputs are for azerty, so have a look in setting :p

I will not come back on this project, but I will still be taking any advice for future projects!

This game uses a lot of awesome visual and audio assets, from unreal engine marketplace and some other sources, I bought some of them, the others are free. 
Maybe a list will come, but if you have any questions on assets used, I should be able to retrieve them :)
